Name: Dangerous Drift
About the game: Dangerous Drift consists of two types of races: Drift and Racing with more than 80 tracks to be completed. Drift: Wear out your vehicle's tires by drifting to the end. Racing: Compete against your rivals and show them who's in charge. Challenge your friends in Dangerous Drift online multiplayer, compete for victory. Choose your vehicle based on the class of the race, among more than 40 different vehicles each with a unique handling. Compete in dozens of different places around the world: Forests, Metropolitan Cities, Swamps, Snowy Mountains, Desert and much more. During races, vehicles can be damaged and body parts lost during collisions, which will hamper the passage of drivers in the next few laps. Each race is different from the other, we will have to compete in different weather conditions (Clear, cloudy, rain, fog, snow) and times of the day (Day, night, sunrise).
